abstract: Creates a new value with the bit pattern of the given pointer.
overview:
## Discussion

The new value represents the address of the pointer passed as `pointer`. If `pointer` is `nil`, the result is `0`.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Swift/UInt/init(bitPattern:)-3qf8b crawled: 2025-12-04T16:21:13Z --- # init(bitPattern:) **Initializer** Creates a new value with the bit pattern of the given pointer. ## Declaration ```swift init

(bitPattern pointer: P?) where P : _Pointer ``` ## Parameters - **pointer**: The pointer to use as the source for the new integer. ## Discussion The new value represents the address of the pointer passed as `pointer`. If `pointer` is `nil`, the result is `0`.
title: init(bitPattern:)
